title: Rosy Apple Whirls Recipe
directions: In a saucepan, combine sugar, water, and cinnamon candies. Bring to a boil and simmer for 5 minutes. Pour into 12" x 8" x 2", reserving 1/2 c. for topping.
Break 1 egg into measuring cup and add enough milk to measure 2/3 cup. Beat with fork to combine. Add to dry ingredients and stir until dough clings together in a ball.
Knead 12 to 15 strokes. Roll out to 12" square. Spread with apples and roll as for a jelly roll. Cut into 8 -1 1/2 inches slices and place on syrup in pan.
Then spoon remaining syrup over top.
Continue baking 10-15 minutes til golden brown.
Serve warm with plain or whipped cream.
ingredients: Prepare 3 c. peeled and diced apples and set aside.
